lead_paragraph: Saltwater contamination from a massive pipeline spill in northwestern North Dakota reached the Missouri River, the state’s environmental chief said Friday.
snippet: Saltwater contamination from a massive pipeline spill in northwestern North Dakota reached the Missouri River, the state’s environmental chief said Friday.

headline.main: North Dakota: Saltwater Contaminates Missouri River After Pipeline Spill
headline.print_headline: North Dakota: Saltwater Contaminates Missouri River After Pipeline Spill
